name: Sleepless Surrender
description:
developed in 3 days for Game Zanga 2017 gamejam

current build 1.0 may contain major errors, we cannot modify the game until the voting period has finished as per gamejam rules!

please tell us about any bugs or errors you encounter so we can work on fixing them in the meantime ^^

2018 edit: game is temporarily unavailable due to major modifications in the making.
